name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lonely Homer Starry Night Sky Pixel Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Join Homer on a quiet, pixelated night under a sparkling starry sky, capturing a nostalgic and serene vibe in every new tab. 🌌🍩🌠

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get lost in a peaceful moment with Homer Simpson as he gazes up at a star-filled night in this pixel art live wallpaper. Perfect for fans of The Simpsons and retro art, this extension combines a familiar character with the beauty of a pixelated, tranquil night sky. It’s an ideal way to unwind while browsing, letting you share in Homer’s quiet reflection beneath the stars.

Key Features
🖼️ Live Pixel Wallpaper: Homer in a pixel art night sky, filled with twinkling stars for a relaxing scene.
🔗 Customizable Site Shortcuts: Quick access to your go-to sites with easy-to-edit shortcuts.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Integrated search for fast browsing, keeping the calm vibe intact.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: A minimalist clock and date so you’re always in sync.
🔗 Quick Access Links: Easily access “Remove Extension” and “More Extensions” links in the lower left corner.
Enjoy a moment of solitude with Homer in each new tab, combining nostalgic visuals with practical tools. It’s the perfect mix of humor, simplicity, and a serene starry sky.
